sentences.chinese: 原汁原味的美味是健康元素。

sentences.english: Large wine cellar with constant temperature and humidity, keeps the most original flavor and sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 恆溫恆溼大型酒窖，鎖住最原汁原味的情懷。

sentences.english: Use water from mountain creeks, original taste and no spices.
sentences.chinese: 全部使用山泉水，原汁原味無放任何調味料。

sentences.english: An emphasis on preserving the natural flavor of the food is the hallmark of Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 保留食物的原汁原味是粵菜的最大特色。

sentences.english: But what Lin Heung does offer is a tasty and unmediated slice of Old Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 但是蓮花茶館絕對給你一個原汁原味的老香港。

sentences.english: This dish is the color red sauce flavor, aromatic flavor, food and drink it.
sentences.chinese: 此菜色澤醬紅原汁原味，醇香誘人，酒飯皆宜。

sentences.english: I am the original sexy beast.
sentences.chinese: 我可是原汁原味的性感尤物。

definition: authentic taste/plain cooked/natural flavor (without spices and seasonings)
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
to prepare (food etc) using a secret recipe
